About Us

Arcain is a student-focused rental and roommate matching platform built for those moving to Baku to study. We simplify one of the biggest challenges students face: finding a suitable home and a trustworthy roommate. By combining verified rental listings with an intelligent roommate matching system, Arcain replaces scattered Facebook and WhatsApp searches with one secure, efficient platform. Our goal is to reduce risk, save time, and help students find the right place and the right people—so they can focus on their education, not housing stress.

Rental listings

We connect students with rental housing in university cities. Browse verified listings, filter by city and price, and find a place that fits.

Our mission

We make finding student accommodation simple and transparent. We verify listings and support both students and landlords with a trusted platform.

For everyone

Students can save favourites and contact landlords. Landlords can list properties, manage images, and reach students looking for housing.

Our Mission

To make finding student accommodation simple, transparent, and stress-free. We verify listings and support both students and landlords with a trusted platform.

For Students

Browse houses by city, filter by price and roommate-friendly options, read detailed descriptions and view verified images. Create an account to save favourites and contact landlords directly.

For Landlords

List your properties, manage images, and reach students looking for housing. Use the admin panel to update listings, verify your portfolio, and grow your tenant base.

Why choose us

  • Verified listings and landlord profiles
  • Filter by city, price, and roommate preference
  • Secure messaging and contact forms
  • Mobile-first design for on-the-go browsing
Browse houses

Find rental housing and roommates near your university. Verified listings and trusted landlords.
